Sister Elaine Brewster of the Pleasant View 5th Ward organized a music theory class.

She had been a member of the Tabernacle Choir and has been accompanist for the Ward for a number of years.

Her husband, Scott Brewster passed away 2 decades ago.

<https://www.deseret.com/2003/4/13/19715367/obituary-dr-b-scott-brewster/>

## Lessons Learned

Hymns are generally in constant notes or ascending or descending steps.

Songs start and end at home
